MR DIY

Scan the QR Code To Check-In.
扫描此 QR 码以提供讯息

or 或者
Visit 浏览 http://spoon.my/store/restoranmamak
or 或者
Enter "restoranmamak" on App

Steps 1 (第一步):

Download The App From Android OR IOS From (https://spoon.my/) And Scan QR Code or use Phone QR Scanner To Scan QR Code
从应用商店里下载 App (https://spoon.my/) 然后扫描 QR 码, 或使用手机内置App扫描

Steps 2 (第二步):

Click Check-In, if you have not registered before, you will need to fill in your personal details
点击 Check-In即可，如果您之前还没注册，你需要填写个人资料.
